metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000071 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: roundcube version 1.3.4 and earlier contains an Insecure Permissions vulnerability in enigma plugin that can result in exfiltration of gpg private key. This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity.

criterions.comment: roundcube package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.10+dfsg.1-1').
